name: Cory Adventure Runner
description:
※ No Internet connection is required.

Cory Adventure is funny Multiple World Runner game. Collect all fruits and reach new highscore , challange your friends and share your top score , avoid all obstacles . 

■ Stretch your fingers! Sounds easy, but guess what? It's more difficult than you think!
■ More than 5 unique stages with various random obstacles!
■ Invite your Facebook friends and compete with them!

No blood or violence! Games for boys, girls and everyone!
Download now!
